channel.title: CVE Feed for CodexHelp -- Master Popups
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CodexHelp -- Master Popups

item.title: CVE-2024-37950|2024-07-23T15:06:00.293Z -- codexhelp -- master%20popups
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CodexHelp Master Popups allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Master Popups: from n/a through 1.0.3.
